contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox person | name =George Randolph Hearst | image = | image_size = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{Birth date|1904|4|23}} | birth_place = | death_date = {{Death date and age|1972|1|26|1904|4|23}} | death_place = | death_cause = | resting_place = | resting_place_coordinates = | residence = | nationality = | other_names = | known_for = | education = | employer =[[Hearst Corporation]] | occupation = | title = | salary = | networth = | height = | weight = | term = | predecessor = | successor = | party = | boards = | religion = | spouse = | partner = | children = [[George Randolph Hearst, Jr.]],<br/>[[Phoebe Hearst Cooke]] | parents =[[William Randolph Hearst]],<br/>[[Millicent Hearst]] | relatives = | signature = | website = | footnotes = }} '''George Randolph Hearst, Sr.''' (April 23, 1904 – January 26, 1972) was the eldest son of [[William Randolph Hearst]]. Though he never held a title higher than Vice-President at the [[Hearst Corporation]], he was listed above many with higher-sounding titles when executives were listed in the company's publications. One of the five family trustees of the trust established under his father's will (which made sure that eight non-family trustees would have majority control), he was able to secure a seat on the corporation's board for his son, [[George Randolph Hearst, Jr.]], in the 1950s. After Hearst Sr.'s death in 1972, his son succeeded him as a trustee and was chairman of the corporation's board from 1996 until his death in 2012. {{Persondata | NAME = Hearst, George Randolph | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = April 23, 1904 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = January 26, 1972 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hearst, George Randolph}} [[Category:1904 births]] [[Category:1972 deaths]] [[Category:American socialites]] [[Category:Hearst family]]
